speaker: parent
content: The Lorax said nothing. Just gave me a glance... just gave me a very sad, sad backward glance... And he lifted himself by the seat of his pants. And I'll never forget the grim look on his face when he hiested himself and took leave of this place, through a hole in the smog, without leaving a trace.
